attributes.action: attach accruing interest to arrears in child support payment to reflect the standard rate of interest that the claimant would have received where their money had been received in line with the payment Schedule issued by the CSA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Attaching an automated interest penalty to child support payments that fall into arrears provides some compensation for the claimant experiencing late or non payment from the absent parent.  
It will encourage many absent parents to make the correct payment amounts and on a regular basis.  

It is a fair system to the absent parent even where arears build up as a result of administrative delays as they will continue to benefit from bank interest on the money up until the time it leaves their account.

It is simple to apply to the current CSA collection procedure and offers an effective deterent for serial offenders.

Many families endure real day to day financial hardship due to inconsistency in CSA payments.

Introducing Arrears Interest would have a positive impact on one of the greatest failings of the current CSA process, without any additional work burden for the CSA staff.
